statements: SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, product_viewed FROM UserActivity WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, date_time, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE product_viewed = 'Product A' ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_viewed, marketing_message_sent FROM UserActivity WHERE product_viewed LIKE '%shoes%' AND marketing_message_sent = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM UserActivity WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM UserActivity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY signup_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, signup_date FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS activity_count FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(activity_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING activity_count > 10;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE date_joined > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_type FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC;
SELECT name, email, timestamp FROM users JOIN activities ON users.user_id = activities.user_id WHERE activities.activity_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, product_id, preference_score FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.product_name, up.preference_score FROM users u JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN products p ON up.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(up.preference_score) AS preference_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_preferences up ON u.user_id = up.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'John' OR username = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY username DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, pv.timestamp FROM users u JOIN product_views pv ON u.user_id = pv.user_id JOIN products p ON pv.product_id = p.product_id WHERE u.username = 'John' AND p.category = 'Clothing';
SELECT u.username, COUNT(u.user_id) AS total_views FROM users u JOIN product_views pv ON u.user_id = pv.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT ua.activity_type, COUNT(ua.activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity ua GROUP BY ua.activity_type HAVING COUNT(ua.activity_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
